caption: School of Paolo Veronese (Italian, 1528–1588), The Visitation and the Holy Family at the Nativity; verso: Figure Studies of a Striding Woman with a Platter or Mirror. Pen, brown ink and brown wash heightened with white on two pieces of blue prepared paper pasted together, with a border in brown wash; 34.6 x 25.7 cm. Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895 (x1948-916)
